name: Zenith Token
description: What is the project about? Zenith.cash is the first leveraged yield farming protocol based on LSD. We aim to boost the liquidity and rewards for LSD new-comers to made a more decentralized liquid staking ecosystem. What makes your project unique? For individuals, constantly monitoring the highest earning LSD protocols can be time-consuming and require significant effort. Additionally, it can require a certain level of expertise to discern whether these contracts are safe to stake any token. Zenith's vision is to provide a platform that helps users automatically select the most secure and high yielding LSD protocols, and maximize returns through leverage. Zenith fully prepares users for the upcoming LSD WAR. With this platform, users can easily and safely obtain competitive earnings from various emerging LSD protocols. Whatâ€™s next for your project? 1. Form partnerships with other LSD projects and DeFi protocols to support yield farming. 2. Enable the safe and effective use of leverage to increase returns on LSDs. 3. Enhance community engagement to foster a more vibrant and active community. What can your token be used for? ZTH is the protocol's native token, representing the protocol's governance rights, profit-sharing rights, voting rights, and liquidity guidance rights.
